statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); project=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir' | xargs basename); branch=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir')" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); printf "\033[96mðŸ“¦ %s\033[0m \033[95mðŸ¤– %s\033[0m \033[92mðŸŒ¿ %s\033[0m" "$project" "$model" "$branch"
